data.text: Everything is perfect ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî• thank you for everything , it‚Äôs so amaizing! We are defenetly coming back so soon with my two boys , and my mom as well ! Every day we went to do gym it‚Äôs so good, and a sauna as well, I‚Äôm so happy because my birthday was  here , in this hotel !
data.title: Kyle is very kindly people ! He is the best ! And the hotel is amazing! Thank‚Äôs everything ! Bless to see you !

data.text: Extraordinary place, people , the staff and one of the best service .. the hotel has everything within, feels like a different town overall..rooms are quite posh, sustainability pro. Unlimited offers at Royal sea lounge, it was the top peak. one of the best restaurant for food and drinks. Rajeev and Rana, looked after us so well and ensured the best bday celebration. Chefs are amazing, food on offer is great. Milos, ling ling beautiful restaurant too, food quality and style with great view, top end. Definitely will visit again..
data.title: One of the best hotel in dubai

data.text: We didn't stay at the hotel, but while visiting the water park we decided to go to the Seascapes restaurant for lunch. It was one of the best lunches in Dubai, many thanks to the waiter Zayn, simply perfect service and knowledge of the dishes on the menu, as well as general information about the hotel itself. I was also pleased with the presentation of the dishes, and the dishes themselves were delicious. My favorite is chicken satay, and the angus burger is simply beyond praise - my son was delighted! Thanks again to Zayn for the warm welcome, and we will come back here again and again!
data.title: Wonderful lunch at Seascapes

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Passport46228805430,

Thank you for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor.

It is always rewarding to receive such praise regarding our products and services. Compliments like yours keep us all very motivated to create an amazing experience for our guests. We will be sure to commend Zayn for the outstanding service.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Best regards,
 
Tom Roelens 
Managing Director, Atlantis The Royal
owner_response.author: Atlantis  The Royal

data.text:
From the moment we arrived everyone we met was so lovely to us. 

All of the restaurants we visited were amazing. Hestons was our absolute favourite and I wish I had the gentleman‚Äôs name who looked after us as he spent so much time with us - talking about the food and showing us the restaurant.He took us to meet the head chef and showed us how the kitchen worked -which was just fabulous. Jaleo was also good fun.  Rakhmatjon at Milos was absolutely fabulous - he advised us on the food and bought us out a yogurt based ice cream to try that we never would have thought to order ourselves -but was a taste sensation. 
Nobu beach was lovely and we were welcomed every morning by the lovely ladies who showed us to sunloungers and then we were looked after all day long by a fabulous gentleman and bought lemon and mint ice shots during the day - we felt very pampered.

All of the staff at the Club lounge were amazing. Kyle made us welcome from the moment we walked in and he has a fabulous energy about him, there was another gentleman who wore the same style suit as Kyle and I am so sorry that I didn‚Äôt get his name but he always had a smile and made us so welcome. Also Champoo and Khairy who went the extra mile. It is a fabulous quiet sanctuary in the hotel and combined with the relaxing atmosphere was a little hidden gem within the hotel. we would  book the club lounge again. Beautifully looked after and the food was fabulous. We didnt get to say goodbye and thank you - but I am sure we will see you all again.

Thank you for the invitation to the cocktail hour at Le Mar - it was really lovely to chat to Aicha and the view from the balcony was amazing.

Thank you also to the very hard working housekeeping staff who kept the room spotless. Such an absolutely stunning hotel and we really enjoyed our stay.

If you are reading this review it will probably be because you are pondering staying at this hotel. Just book it would be my advice. I am not sure if I'll ever quite be able to top my stay here.

My tip would be to book the club lounge as its a hidden gem within the hotel and a sanctuary of calm - where the pampering is unbelievable.
data.title: The most luxurious hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear happyinlife30,

Thank you for sharing your review on TripAdvisor.

It was a pleasure to have you as our guest here at Atlantis The Royal and I am very glad to learn that our products and services exceeded your expectations. We will be sure to commend Rakhmatjon, Kyle, Champoo, Aicha, and Khairy for their outstanding service. 

Thank you once again and we look forward to welcoming you back at Atlantis The Royal.

Best regards,
 
Tom Roelens 
Managing Director, Atlantis The Royal
owner_response.author: Atlantis  The Royal

data.text: Today I visited the hotel and my experience is that the hotel is a pleasant place to spend a good time in aesthetics, wonderful food.  I spent the day by the pool, which is located next to the "Nogu" restaurant.  Starting with the service, then the hygiene, and the food crowns it all.  And what convinced me that the management cares about its guests who want peace and will pay for it, is that children under 21 are not allowed in this pool.  Several times mothers with small children came but were kindly reminded that children are not allowed in the pool.  First pool where I didn't give my hard earned money to listen to someone's loud kids.  Bravo !  I hope it will stay like this.
data.title: Bravo ! Finally a fulfilled promise!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Aliceinnowhereland,

I am genuinely delighted to read your positive comment, and I assure you that I will personally convey your appreciation to all my colleagues who contributed to making your visit a memorable one. Once again, thank you for your kind words, and we eagerly anticipate the pleasure of welcoming you back to Atlantis, The Royal, for another exceptional experience.

Best regards,
 
Tom Roelens 
Managing Director, Atlantis The Royal
